name: Cary Grant
title: Cary Grant
content: Cary Grant (1904-1986) was a British-American icon who was celebrated for his timeless charm and versatile roles in classics like North by Northwest (1959) and Bringing Up Baby (1938). His debonair demeanor and comedic talents made him a Hollywood legend, leaving an enduring legacy in film history.

name: Ward Bond
title: Ward Bond
content: Ward Bond (1903-1960) was a notable American character actor, renowned for over 200 film appearances. Recognized for supporting roles in classics like It's a Wonderful Life (1946) and collaborations with director John Ford, including The Searchers (1956), Bond's versatility and memorable performances mark him as a respected figure in Hollywood history. His impressive track record is however not completely represented in our dataset. Indeed, in the end, only a few films survived our analysis, and those might not be random films. While interesting, these considerations must be taken into account when considering the almost 10 score difference.

name: Martin Scorsese
title: Martin Scorsese
content: Martin Scorsese, born in 1942, is a world-renowned filmmaker. However, he often makes quick appearances in his movie as caméo, and it's interesting to see that he's appearing out of our analysis. While funny and interesting, these results should be taken with a bit of care since his roles are not really a relevant factor, but more a confounding effect of him being a director.

name: Marlon Brando
title: Marlon Brando
content: Marlon Brando (1924-2004), an iconic American actor, revolutionized film with his method of acting. Renowned for transformative performances in classics like A Streetcar Named Desire (1951) and The Godfather (1972), Brando's profound impact on acting cements his status as one of cinema's greatest. Our analysis probably rightfully propulses him at a solid positive 9 score difference.

name: Catherine Deneuve
title: Catherine Deneuve
content: Catherine Deneuve, born in 1943, is a renowned French actress celebrated for her versatile and captivating performances in critically acclaimed movies. From complex dramas like Belle de Jour to enchanting musicals like The Umbrellas of Cherbourg, Deneuve's enduring collaboration with esteemed directors and her elegant screen presence consistently place her at the forefront of international cinema. She's one of the few female actresses on this side of the chart.

name: Georges Clooney
title: Georges Clooney
content: You already know Georges… what else? ☕

name: Kelly Preston
title: Kelly Preston
content: Kelly Preston (1962-2020) is an American actress, showcased for her versatility in a range of films, from comedies like Twins (1988) to dramas like Jerry Maguire (1996). Known for her engaging performances and on-screen charm, Preston's contributions have left a lasting impact on Hollywood. Most of her appearances are in comedies or dramas. It's interesting to see that despite starring in drama films, a genre slightly favored by critics, the actress is most of the time more linked to movies preferred by users.
